Literature.Title: The Trp-rich Antimicrobial Amphiphiles With Intramolecular Aromatic Interactions for the Treatment of Bacterial Infection
Literature.Author: Wang Z, Li Q, Li J, Shang L, Chou S, Lyu Y, Shan A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=1µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=2µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(no activity data)
